about-desc1: St Alessandro University Institute is a distinctive anglo-saxon university with future international reputation for higher standards of achievements and innovations in all areas of professionalism, arts, sciences and technology. If you are looking for a life-changing experience that will equip you with the knowledge and skills you will need to meet the future with confidence, we are sure that you will find it Here. As a graduate or postgraduate student in St Alessandro University Institute , you will study in modern surroundings that boast exceptionally well-equipped studios, workshops and facilities.
about-desc2: S.A.U officially opened its doors on the 17th of October 2022, close to a year after the opening of ST ALESSANDRO CLINIC on the 1st of December 2021. Located in Douala, the capital of the Littoral region of Cameroon.
about-desc3: SAU is created in memory of Professor Alessandro Faldini, a renowned orthopaedic surgeon whom through humaniterinean activities, touched the lives of many all over the world. He was a mentor of Dr. Mutsu Venantius; the founder of St Alessandro University and Clinic. The creation of these institutions was the idea of Dr. Mutsu Venantius Bumaha and wife Dr. Florence Nsuh Mutsu, to provide healthcare and professional education to the population of Cameroon and beyond. Dr Mutsu obtained a Bachelor of Medicine/ Bachelor of Surgey and a postgraduate diploma in Obstetrics & Gynaecology form the University of Calabar Nigeria in 2004. Under the mentorship of Professor Alessandro Faldini  at Bologna  Orthopaedic Institute of Italy he studied orthopaedic surgery and practiced under the catholic hospitals of the Franciscan sisters of Cameroon. Under ORTHOPAEDICS ONLUS with Prof. Alessandro as president, Dr Mutsu participated  in surgical missions in Bafut, Edea and Tanzania from 2007 to 2018. In January 2015 he obtained a Fellowship in Orthopaedic Surgery at GALEAZZI ORTHOPAEDIC INSTITUTE, Milan Italy. In 2020 Prof. Alessandro Faldini passed on to Glory and his son Prof. Cesare Faldini took over as the president of ORTHOPAEDICS ONLUS(now ORTOPEDICI.ORG), and the journey of serving humanity continues.
about-founding-desc: ST ALESSANDRO CLINIC & UNIVERSITY INSTITUTE DOUALA created in August 2021 and named after late Professor Alessandro Faldini, a father who has done great things in the field of orthopedic surgery. Help those who are physically challenged and the underprivileged in developing countries was his concern. We are thus continuing from where he left us. We are out to offer to the population of Cameroon and beyond, high level of medical care and training at affordable cost.
about-mission-desc: It really matters and then like it really doesn't matter. What matters is the people who are sparked by it. And the people who are like offended by it, it doesn't matter.
